Review: I hate this movie. Future me: don’t try to rewatch because it’s in the Criterion Collection. Abort.

Movie: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me

Review: Shiiiiit maaaaan. That honk muf’ be messin’ mah old lady. Got to be runnin’ cold upside down his head you know? Hey, you know what they say: see a broad to get dat booty, yak ‘em! Shiiiiiiiit.

I’m trying to be more critical of the films I watch and not just get sucked away by twists and turns or a specific scene that really sticks with me at the end of the movie. Normally, I would rate this as a 4-star flick (I’m a very generous guy), but in my time between viewing ‘The Long Goodbye’ and writing these thoughts, I’ve found myself disappointed in the film. This is my first Altman outing and I found the…
